summary: The diff implements all three requirements: FriendRequestsList is integrated into MessagingPage with proper hook usage and neon-themed styling. The component is positioned in the 'Friends' tab, displays pending requests with accept/decline buttons, uses useGetFriendRequests hook, and includes a prominent heading with neon styling matching the SkelUlt theme.

hallucinated_features.description: Badge notification count on Friends tab showing pending request count
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff adds a red badge with pending request count on the Friends tab trigger, which was not requested in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: Empty state with Inbox icon and 'No pending friend requests' message
hallucinated_features.reason: The FriendRequestsList component includes an empty state UI with an Inbox icon and explanatory text when no requests exist, which was not specified in the requirements

hallucinated_features.description: Loading skeleton states for friend requests
hallucinated_features.reason: The component includes detailed skeleton loading states that were not explicitly requested, though loading state handling was mentioned in REQ-61
